Investor_14_pre_3.name: Juan Carlos Reyes
Investor_14_pre_3.content: I have demonstrated a commitment to cooperation, fairness, and transparency throughout the investment process. My clarity in expectations and active engagement has reinforced my reputation as a reliable and considerate investor, dedicated to mutual benefits.

Investor_14_pre_4.name: Juan Carlos Reyes

My proactive engagement and defined expectations have led to positive outcomes, reflecting my reliability as a considerate and responsible investor. This experience has further solidified my reputation, showcasing my dedication to mutual benefits and long-term partnerships.
